item.title: Android app with react native
item.description: Issue I met I want to follow this article to learn creating apps with react native. But I met several issues: error Failed to launch emulator. Reason: No emulators found as an output of emulator -list-avds. warn Please launch an emulator manually or connect a device. Otherwise app may fail to launch. info Installing the app… Task :app:installDebug FAILED Then I realized the another issue prompted: /bin/sh: adb: command not found
